raw.title: Consumer complaint advisory
raw.body: If you have an unresolved issue with a merchant, first gather receipts, communications, and timelines. Contact the merchant's support to attempt a resolution. If unsuccessful, file a complaint with your local consumer protection agency and provide all evidence. Track responses and escalate to small claims court if needed.

timeline.details: consider small claims court if not resolved
